investors.description: Extracts a list of all investors, including subscribers (Teckningsåtagare) and guarantors (Garantiåtagande), using a detailed, multi-level extraction logic.
investors.semantic_search_query: Section or table listing investor names, subscription commitments (teckningsåtaganden or teckningsförbindelser), and guarantee commitments (garantiåtaganden or garanti)

record_date.description: Extracts the record date ('Avstämningsdag') for determining shareholder rights.

sub_start_date.description: Extracts the start date for the subscription period.

sub_end_date.description: Extracts the end date for the subscription period.

inc_rights_date.description: Extracts the date when the rights are included in the share price.
inc_rights_date.semantic_search_query: Sista datum när aktien handlas inklusive rätter

ex_rights_date.description: Extracts the date when the rights are excluded from the share price.
ex_rights_date.semantic_search_query: Första datum när aktien handlas exklusive rätter

rights_start_date.semantic_search_query: Första datum för handel med teckningsrätter

rights_end_date.semantic_search_query: Sista datum för handel med teckningsrätter
